The Great Buddha of Kamakura is a bronze statue of Amida Buddha, which stands on the grounds of the Kotokuin Temple in Kamakura, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. With a height of 13.35 meters, it is the second tallest bronze Buddha statue in Japan, surpassed only by the statue in Nara's Todaiji Temple.
